summary: A Chinese special force soldier with extraordinary marksmanship is confronted by a group of deadly foreign mercenaries who are hired to assassinate him by a vicious drug lord.
cast: Jing Wu|Nan Yu|Dahong Ni|Kevin Lee|Zhu Xiao|Dongyan Ma|Zhaoqi Shi|Zibin Fang|Sen Wang|Tengyuan Liu|Yongda Zhang|Xiaolong Zhang|Yi Zhao|Zi Liang|Guangping Guo|Ping Ru|Doudou|Zhang Heng|Miaomiao Tian|Yuanyuan Shan|Mao San|Scott Adkins|Christopher Collins|Sona Eyambe|Kyle Shapiro|Samuel Thivierge|Alberto Bossum|Afshin|Chris Collins|Ziyi Deng|Xiaolong Zhuang
title: Zhan lang
